entry.title: Template: Математическое обеспечение Вашего бизнеса
entry.content:
<data:blog.pageTitle/> */ /* General style */ body { font: $bodyfont; background: $bgcolor; background-image: url("$bgUrl"); color: $textcolor; } a:link { color: $linkcolor; } a:visited { color: $visitedlinkcolor; } a:hover { color: $hovercolor; } h1 { border-bottom: dotted 1px $bordercolor; color: $pagetitlecolor; font: $pagetitlefont; } h1 a, h1 a: link, h1 a: visited { color: $pagetitlecolor; } h2.date-header { color: $footercolor; } h2, h3.post-title, h3, h4, h5 { color: $titlecolor; font: $pagetitlefont; } .post { background: $bgcolor; padding: $containerpadding; border-radius: $containerpadding; } .post-footer { color: $footercolor; } .post table.boxed td, .post table.boxed th { color: $bgcolor; } .post table.boxed th { background-color: $linkcolor; border-color: $pagetitlecolor; } .post table.boxed td { background-color: $descriptioncolor; border-color: $bordercolor; } .titleimage { width: $sidebarwidth; margin: 0 $containerpadding; } .titlewrapper { min-width: $minmainwidth; max-width: $maxmainwidth; } #CustomSearch1 { width: $sidebarwidth; padding: $containerpadding 0; } #outer-wrapper { padding: 0 $containerpadding; } #main-wrapper { min-width: $minmainwidth; max-width: $maxmainwidth; } #comments { color: $textcolor; } #comments .comment-footer { color: $footercolor; } .sidebar { color: $sidebartextcolor; } .sidebar .widget, .main .widget { border-bottom: 1px dotted $bordercolor; } .sidebar .widget { width: $sidebarwidth; } .profile-data { font: $postfooterfont; color: $sidebarcolor; } .profile-link { font: $postfooterfont; } ]]>
skip to main | skip to sidebar

 

1
,

entry.title: The type of publishing done for this blog.
The name of the blog
A description of the blog
Whether this blog can be promoted on Blogger
Whether this blog should be indexed by search engines

Whether Quick Editing is enabled
Whether to show a link for users to e-mail posts
Maximum number of things to show on the main page"
Unit of things to show on the main page
The number of the date header format
The number of the archive index date format
The number of the time stamp format
The time zone for this blog
Language for this blog

Whether to convert line breaks into
tags in post editor
Whether to show the title field
Whether to show a related link box in the post composer
Whether float alignment is enabled for the blog
The template for blog posts
Whether to show comments
Who can comment
Default comment mode for posts
Whether to show comment backlinks on the blog
Default backlinks mode for posts
Comment time stamp format number
Blog comment form location
Whether to enable comment moderation
Number of days after which new comments are subject to moderation
Whether to require commenters to complete a Captcha
Whether to show profile images in comments
List of e-mail addresses to send notifications of new comments to
Email address to send notifications of new comments needing moderation to
Blog comment message
How frequently this blog should be archived
Whether to provide an archive page for each post
The type of feed to provide for blog posts
The type of feed to provide for blog comments
The type of feed to provide for per-post comments
URL to redirect post feed requests to
Footer to append to the end of each entry in the post feed
Comma separated list of emails to send new blog posts to
The access type for the readers of the blog.
The list of emails for users who have permission to read the blog.
The list of authors' emails who have permission to publish.
The list of administrators' emails for the blog.
Контакты
